vocabularies.english_definition: to share or exchange information, news, or ideas
examples: We need to communicate more effectively with our team.
Technology has changed how people communicate with each other.

vocabularies.english_definition: able to be maintained at a certain rate or level without depleting natural resources
examples: Sustainable development meets the needs of the present without compromising future generations.
The company is committed to sustainable business practices.

vocabularies.english_definition: including or dealing with all or nearly all elements or aspects of something
examples: The report provides a comprehensive analysis of the market trends.
We offer comprehensive training programs for all employees.
